properties.site-address: Land at Sandy Lane (Former Poultry Farm), Burton and Dalby
properties.notes: Ownership unknown by organisation; Permission with Section 106; brownfield site at the time of application comprises a range of derelict buildings dating from 1940s and has been subject to illegal tipping; para 1.7 of planning and heritage statement of application says it is brownfield. Demolition of existing structures and redevelopment of the site to create 30 dwellings (Use Class C3) including the refurbishment of an existing Nissen Hut to create a community space (Use Class D1) space for biomass boiler and associated open space; landscaping; drainage infrastructure and highways' improvements.

properties.site-address: Land at Thorpe Road, Melton Mowbray
properties.ownership: not owned by a public authority
properties.notes: Single ownership; MEL7 - Brownfield Site. The site is adjacent to the main town of Melton Mowbray. There are good connections to services and facilities and employment and good transport choice to Melton Mowbray town centre including walking and cycling. The site is well contained within the built form. The existing buildings are protected by an Article 4 direction. The principle of development looks acceptable subject to retention of important buildings and high quality design to protect the local heritage asset. The site is currently being marketed.

properties.site-address: Land at Snow Hill, Melton Mowbray
properties.ownership: not owned by a public authority

Demolition of existing industrial buildings and erection of 240-320 dwellings

Demolition of the majority of the existing buildings on the site. Remodelling retained buildings to provide 17 new dwellings with construction of 120 new dwellings
